The projection for 2020 uses 2017 mortality as a baseline, applying shares of non-Hispanic white Covid-19 mortality to total excess deaths for each state as of July 25. Source: Elizabeth Wrigley-Field, “U.S. Racial Inequality May Be as Deadly as Covid-19”
